title: Consolidate Claude 4 parallel execution documentation
description:
Merge overlapping parallel execution guidance:

**Current state (~900 lines across 3 files):**
- claude-4-parallel-tools.md (464 lines)
- claude-4-tool-usage.md (215 lines) - references parallel patterns
- claude-4-migration.md (222 lines) - includes parallel examples

**Target (~500 lines):**
- claude-4-guide.md - single comprehensive reference covering:
  - Tool usage patterns
  - Parallel execution best practices
  - Migration notes (brief section)
  - Examples (deduplicated)

**Files to modify:**
- Create: .claude/reference/claude-4-guide.md
- Archive: Individual claude-4-*.md files
- Update: References in CLAUDE.md and command files

**Acceptance criteria:**
- All Claude 4 guidance in one place
- ~400 tokens saved
- Easier to maintain as model updates
notes: Completed 2026-01-22. Created claude-4-guide.md (~230 lines) consolidating parallel tools, tool usage, and migration content. Original files archived to .archive/consolidated-2026-01-22/. Achieved ~75% reduction from ~900 lines.
decision_rationale: Combined all Claude 4 guidance into single file. Eliminated repeated examples and merged parallel execution patterns with tool usage guidelines.
